message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even.
Considering the inflation, this is a better deal for you than the last one!
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the fairest I can go.
You're losing value every round, don't wait too long!
Alice, time is running out! This is my final offer. You're getting the better end of the deal, so take it before inflation eats away at my share even more.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one more chance. Inflation is really hurting your share now.
